roleset.name: appease, using deceit or evasion
roleset.note: FOB_OFF-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from fob.01-v)

example.name: all args, plus argMs
example.text: Doctors-1 also try *PRO*-1 to fob you off with medication first sometimes , which you have said you do n't want at this stage .
example.arg: which you have said you don't want at this stage
